com.mongodb
Class MongoURI

java.lang.Object
  com.mongodb.MongoURI

public class MongoURI
extends Object

Represents a URI which can be used to create a Mongo instance. The URI describes the hosts to be used and options.

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

MongoURI

public MongoURI(String uri)
Creates a MongoURI described by a String. examples mongodb://127.0.0.1 mongodb://fred:foobar@127.0.0.1/

Parameters:
uri - the URI
